questions.question: What is the modern periodic law?
options: Properties of elements are a periodic function of their atomic numbers.
Properties of elements are a periodic function of their atomic masses.
Properties of elements are a periodic function of their densities.
Properties of elements are a periodic function of their volumes.
questions.answer: Properties of elements are a periodic function of their atomic numbers.

questions.question: Which of the following elements is a noble gas?
What is the main characteristic of alkali metals?
options: They are highly reactive and have one electron in their outermost shell.
They are non-reactive and have a full outer shell.
They are gases at room temperature.
They have high melting and boiling points.
questions.answer: They are highly reactive and have one electron in their outermost shell.
